meta.title: Free Tool to Convert JPG Images to PNG with Transparent Background
meta.description: High-quality JPG to PNG converter with transparency support. Easily convert images to PNG online. No registration, free, browser-based tool available for immediate use.
meta.keywords: jpg to png, jpeg to png, image converter, transparent background, png transparency, free converter, online image tool

title: JPG to PNG Converter
description: Convert JPG images to PNG format with transparency support

upload.label: Upload JPG Image
upload.dragDrop: Drag & drop file here or click to browse

status.browserProcessing: Processing is done in your browser, so speed may vary depending on your device

error.fileSize: File size must be less than 10MB

overview.title: Overview
overview.content:
JPG to PNG Converter is a free online tool that transforms JPG images into high-quality PNG format. With special support for transparent backgrounds (transparent PNG), it's widely used for presentations, web development, design work, and various other applications.
No installation required - works completely in your browser, making it instantly accessible on both PCs and smartphones.

steps.title: Upload Image
steps.description: Drag & drop your JPG file or click the 'Select File' button to upload.

steps.title: Automatic Conversion
steps.description: Conversion to PNG format starts automatically after upload. Background transparency processing is also handled automatically.

steps.title: Download Converted Image
steps.description: Once conversion is complete, click the 'Download' button to save your PNG image.

users.name: Web Designer A
users.comment: I often need to convert JPGs to transparent PNGs for client banners, and this tool has been a lifesaver. No need to launch software - I can quickly finish in my browser, which is super convenient.

users.name: Sales Professional B
users.comment: I use this tool when I need to clean up icon images for internal presentations. It's wonderful that even people who can't use image editing software can use it without any issues.

users.name: Online Shop Owner C
users.comment: This helps me when I want to remove backgrounds from product images to make them look cleaner. The automatic transparency processing when converting to PNG has greatly improved my work efficiency.

items.title: Background Transparency Support
items.description: AI automatically removes backgrounds from images, saving them as transparent PNGs.

items.title: No Installation & Completely Free
items.description: Works entirely in your browser. No complicated software downloads or registrations required.

items.title: High-Quality Conversion
items.description: Maintains image quality during conversion, producing crisp PNG images.

items.title: Multiple Device Support
items.description: Compatible with PCs, smartphones, and tablets, allowing you to use it anytime, anywhere.

questions.question: Is this tool really free?
questions.answer: Yes, all features are available for free. No registration required.

questions.question: Can I convert multiple images at once?
questions.answer: Currently, we support one-by-one conversion, but we plan to add batch processing functionality in the future.

questions.question: Are my uploaded images stored on your server?
questions.answer: No, uploaded images are automatically deleted after conversion, ensuring your privacy.

questions.question: What should I do if background transparency doesn't work well?
questions.answer: Transparency may be difficult for images with complex backgrounds. For best results, use images where the subject and background are clearly separated.

questions.question: Can I use this on a smartphone?
questions.answer: Yes, you can easily use it from any smartphone browser, whether iOS or Android.
